name: Hell's Cookhouse
description:
You are tasked with collecting ingredients for a variety of recipes, but they're not going to come easily...

To aid in the kitchen you are equipped with a (kitchen) gun, and a cleaver. While the gun boasts power, it destroys any ingredients beyond use, so the cleaver is needed to deal the finishing blow, lest the resources go to waste.

The demons can smell your cooking however, and won't rest until they've pierced your defences...

--------------------------------------------------------------

Unity WebGL is a bit wonky, but make sure to go fullscreen (icon is on the bottom right). Press ESC to exit fullscreen and/or unlock the cursor from the game.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Created for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam. All art + code created by me, with most sounds coming from freesounds. The ""music"" was composed by me however, at around 6am by hammering on a keyboard before the deadline.

The theme of the jam was to mix two different genres into one game. I decided on mixing Cooking games with First Person Shooters. In the end it admittedly was mostly the latter, but given the amount of time I had I'm fairly happy with the results. I had some more ideas that didn't make it, such as a flamethrower to "cook" the monsters, as well as more meaningful ingredients and recipes. Definitely focused on the FPS mechanics first.
